Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2015 06:35PM 513mgv wrote: I will be starting rads to most of my spine and sacrum 10/26, feeling a bit anxious about "possible" reflux and diarrhea, "might" also have some bladder issues. RO stated would not effect the heart but may have increased bronchial secretions. I have scattered tumors from t4 all the way down. Bone scan Monday, Sims on Wednesday. I will be getting a total of 15 treatments and probably have a liquid or soft Thanksgiving dinner. Marilyn
